resources.string: To validate a vote you need to read a file or a QR code.
Congratulations! The vote vote we just read is valid for the choice you entered.
Oops! It seems like the vote does not contain the choice you just entered. Maybe you misspelled it actually does not contain said choice. Try again!
The public parameters from the file are not valid. Maybe there is an error in the file. Try downloading it again.
The signature within the file is not valid. Maybe there is an error in the file. Try downloading it again
